source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_SEQ_00<tab>The impatient moogle appears to have reached the end of his tether.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_SEQ_00<tab>Le Mog agité a l'air encore plus inquiet qu'avant.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_SEQ_01<tab>The impatient moogle tells you that his three young charges have disappeared into the dragon-infested wastes of Ohl Tahn, seeking to emulate the adventurers they idolize. He implores you follow the young moogles into this den of danger, and save them from themselves.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_SEQ_01<tab>Le Mog agité vous a demandé d'aller chercher ses trois compagnons qui sont partis à l'aventure à Ohl Tahn après avoir entendu parler de vos exploits, en dépit des dangereux disciples de Nidhogg qui y rôdent.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_SEQ_02<tab>You find the adventurous mooglings and convince them to return to their master. Head back to Zenith to ensure that they have all returned safely to the impatient moogle's side.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez retrouvé les trois petits aspirants aventuriers, qui ne se sont pas fait prier pour rentrer. Retourner voir le Mog agité à Zénith.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_SEQ_03<tab>The impatient moogle thanks you for rescuing his charges, before lambasting them for their reckless behavior. However, it seems that your successful rescue effort has only served to increase their admiration for adventurers. Knowing full well that it will further test their master's meager patience, the undeterred trio head out on another exciting adventure.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_SEQ_03<tab>Le Mog agité a fait la morale à ses compagnons, leur demandant d'être plus prudents, mais ceux-ci n'ont rien voulu savoir et sont aussitôt repartis à l'aventure, des étoiles dans les yeux, apparemment enthousiasmés par votre présence.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_000<tab>Oh, adventurer! It's awful! It's terrible! It's infuriating, kupo! My three young charges have flown off into the wild wastes of Ohl Tahn!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_000<tab>Ah<var 1D /var>! J'ai failli oublier<var 1D /var>! Pendant que je vous tiens, j'ai quelque chose d'urgent à vous demander, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_001<tab>They've been watching you adventurers heading over there to face the dragons, and the reckless little rascals thought to try it for themselves, kupo! Please, adventurer─you've got to bring them back before it's too late!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_001<tab>Trois de mes compagnons qui ont entendu parler de vos exploits sont partis à l'aventure à Ohl Tahn<var 1D /var>! Il y a plein de disciples de Nidhogg là-bas<var 1D /var>! Il faut que vous les rameniez au plus vite, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_010<tab>Ohl Tahn's full of dragons, dinosaurs, wyverns, and worse! It's no place for a moogle, particularly not a trio of puny scamps like them. Oh, adventurer, I'm so worried about them! Please say you'll bring them back to me!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_010<tab>C'est pour vous imiter que mes trois compagnons sont partis à l'aventure à Ohl Tahn<var 1D /var>! Si vous ne vous dépêchez pas de les ramener, ils pourraient se faire dévorer par les disciples de Nidhogg qui y rôdent, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGA01845_000_020<tab>Kupooo! It's a real-life adventurer! I bet you're not tired at all, are you? I'm so pooped I can barely lift my pom-pom... I think I'm going to have to call it a day.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGA01845_000_020<tab>Oh, c'est vous, kuppo<var 1D /var>!? Vous n'avez même pas l'air fatigué<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>! Comment vous faites<var 1D /var>? Moi, je suis éreinté<var 1D /var>! D'ailleurs, je vais rentrer. J'en ai assez pour aujourd'hui, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGB01845_000_021<tab>I can't go on, kupo─it's so scary out here! I don't know how you adventurers do it! ...He asked you to bring me back to Zenith? You don't have to tell me twice─I'm going to fly back as fast as my wings will carry me!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGB01845_000_021<tab>Kuppopo... Je ne suis pas trop rassuré, là. Je n'aurai jamais votre courage... Vous êtes venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> me chercher<var 1D /var>? Vous inquiétez pas, je ne vais pas me faire prier pour rentrer, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGC01845_000_022<tab>Kupo, kupo, kupooo! Isn't adventuring fun? There are dragons everywhere, but I'm not scared at all! The next time I go on an adventure, I'm going to pull one's tail!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGC01845_000_022<tab>Hé hé<var 1D /var>! C'est excitant de partir à l'aventure<var 1D /var>! Par contre, il y a quand même beaucoup de disciples de Nidhogg dans le coin, dites donc. C'est pas que j'aie peur, hein, mais je crois qu'il est temps que je rentre, kuppo.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGA01845_000_030<tab>Adventurers never seem to get tired, kupo... <sigh> I wish I was strong like you...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGA01845_000_030<tab>Vous avez une énergie et une endurance incroyables. Je vous admire, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGB01845_000_031<tab>It takes a braver moogle than me to become an adventurer, kupo...
TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGC01845_000_032<tab>Did you come looking for us just because he asked you to? That's the adventuring spirit right there, kupo!
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGC01845_000_032<tab>C'est tellement gentil à vous d'être venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> nous chercher<var 1D /var>! Vous êtes un modèle pour nous, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_040<tab>Thank you for bringing them back from that dreadful place, adventurer! It's a wonder the fluff-headed fools didn't get themselves eaten, kupo.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_040<tab>Merci d'avoir ramené mes compagnons sains et saufs<var 1D /var>! C'est un miracle qu'il ne leur soit rien arrivé à Ohl Tahn, kuppo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_041<tab>Do you hear me? I've had about as much of your nonsense as I'm going to take, kupo! No more adventures, alright?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_041<tab>Quand est-ce que vous allez apprendre à être prudents, kuppo<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGA01845_000_042<tab>...B-But how are we ever going to become adventurers if you don't let us practice!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_TEMPLEMOGA01845_000_042<tab>Ça y est, il nous refait la morale... C'est pas en étant prudents à l'extrême qu'on va devenir des aventuriers, kuppo<var 1D /var>!
TEXT_HEAVNZ510_01845_AIRPORTMOG01845_000_043<tab>Ah non<var 1D /var>! Les voilà repartis<var 1D /var>! Revenez, kuppo<var 1D /var>!
